content: If you can't log in with your existing account or want to be registered as a new user, contact the portal administrator.

comment.text: This translation key is used for an error message that appears when a user attempts to log in and fails. It provides instructions on how to contact the portal administrator for assistance. This text typically appears in a dialog or recovery prompt when a user's existing account cannot be accessed.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Cari hesabınızla giriş edə bilmirsinizsə' is grammatically awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'Əgər cari hesabınızla giriş edə bilmirsinizsə'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Əgər cari hesabınızla giriş edə bilmirsinizsə

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'portal administratoru' is a direct transliteration and might not be the most accurate or understandable term for an Azerbaijani audience. It's better to use a more localized equivalent, depending on the portal's specific role.

The phrase "If you can't log in with your existing account" is translated as "Wenn Sie sich mit Ihren Anmeldeinformationen nicht einloggen können". While understandable, 'Anmeldeinformationen' is a more technical term. A more natural phrasing for a general user might be something like 'Wenn Sie sich nicht mit Ihrem bestehenden Konto einloggen können.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wenn Sie sich nicht mit Ihrem bestehenden Konto einloggen können

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'or want to be registered as a new user' is translated as 'oder ein neues Profil erstellen möchten'. 'Erstellen möchten' implies creation from scratch. 'Sich neu registrieren möchten' would more accurately convey the idea of creating a new account.

The phrase "contact the portal administrator" could be more accurately translated as "դիմեք պորտալի վարչակազմին" (dimyek portaly varchakazmin) to more closely match the intended meaning of contacting the administrator of the specific portal.

The Armenian translation uses a mix of uppercase and lowercase letters.  Consistency in capitalization would improve readability. While Armenian capitalization rules are different from English, maintaining a consistent style within the document is generally preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider standardizing the capitalization throughout the Armenian text.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "contact the portal administrator" is not accurately reflected. "ຜູ້ດູແລລະບົບ portal" is a literal translation of "portal administrator" but doesn't convey the intended meaning of contacting an administrator for assistance. It might confuse users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຖ້າທ່ານບໍ່ສາມາດເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບໄດ້ຫຼືຕ້ອງການລົງທະບຽນໃຫມ່, ກະລຸນາຕິດຕໍ່ຜູ້ບໍລິຫານລະບົບ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English sentence "If you can't log in with your existing account" is not accurately reflected in the Russian translation. The Russian translation implies the user is already registered, while the English refers to difficulty logging in with an existing account (which may or may not require registration).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Если у Вас возникли проблемы с входом в существующую учетную запись, или Вы хотите зарегистрироваться как новый пользователь...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'contact the portal administrator' is too formal and doesn't match the original's tone.

The phrase "existing account" is not accurately translated. "පවතින ගිණුමෙන්" (pavathina ginumena) literally translates to 'from an existing account'. It should more accurately convey the meaning of 'with your existing account'.

The term "portal administrator" could be more precise.  'ද්වාරයේ පරිපාලක' (dwaarayee paripaalaka) sounds like a gatekeeper or someone managing a physical portal. A more appropriate translation would reflect someone administering a digital portal.

The term 'portal administrator' is translated as 'admina portálu'. While understandable, 'admin portálu' would be more formal and potentially more appropriate for a help text. 'Admina portálu' is slightly informal.
The word 'постојец́им' is a typo and should be 'постојећим'.
